column2: an A.M. Eatery////We were starving so each ordered 2-3 things each. My favorites were the blueberry danish pancake
column7: and chili verde Benedict. Their pancakes were huge ($4 for one pancake) and very light/fluffy. Each Benedict comes with a different kind of toast instead of the normal English muffin
column8: which I usually think is too heavy. For vegan/vegetarian diners their quinoa breakfast bowl with sriracha broth and assorted vegetables/ mushrooms is a really good option as well!
